basics.name: Derek Nishimura Jr
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Assistant teacher for King Intermediate summer band program
highlights: Manage a small group of students while teaching the fundamentals of music theory
Teach students how to properly play a concert band instrument

work.summary: Help Desk Consultant at the ITS Help Desk
highlights: Troubleshoot user software and hardware issues

awards.title: Male Scholar Athelete of the Year
awards.summary: Award given to the male student with the most sports played while also maintaining a high (4.0) GPA throughout the year.

awards.title: Outstanding Student Leader Award
awards.summary: Award given to the student holding multiple leadership roles in clubs around campus and held in high regard by faculty.
